# GitHub Copilot Instructions - NOTON Web

## Project Overview
This is a static website repository for NOTON Radar Detector app, published via GitHub Pages. Contains marketing websites and legal documents for both Android and iOS versions.

## Key Guidelines
- All HTML files are public and will be served via GitHub Pages
- Development documents (CLAUDE.md, DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md) are gitignored
- Maintain Spanish as primary language for documentation
- Keep legal documents formal and GDPR-compliant
- Responsive design for mobile devices is mandatory
- Language selector should use flag icons (ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹)

## Project Structure
- `/android/` - Android app website and legal documents
- `/ios/` - iOS app website and legal documents
- `/shared/` - Shared CSS, JS, and images
- Root `index.html` - Landing page with platform selector

## Development Rules
- Never modify URLs of existing legal documents without coordination
- Test all language selectors thoroughly
- Maintain consistency between Android and iOS versions
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility best practices
